Module com.bcs2024.knapsack
Package com.bcs2024.knapsack.algorithm

Class Chromosome

java.lang.Object
com.bcs2024.knapsack.algorithm.Chromosome
public class Chromosome extends Object
Chromosome represents a potential solution to the knapsack problem in the context of a genetic algorithm. It consists of an array of genes (parcel types and their rotations) and a fitness value evaluating the solution's quality.
